message: Great to see celebrities taking a stand on breastfeeding and helping it become more normal in the states. message:
Regarding the public education issue, the academic elite seem to be disconnected from the people on the ground. With job losses, immigration and unemployment, people are displaced and become transient. Without stability, Kids who are transient don't have an easy time studying, or learning, because they move so often. They
[...Content omitted due to length constraints...]
state government funding and control. Once FOR PROFIT colleges were allowed to tap into federal student loan money, all college costs spiraled everywhere. Congress holds the purse strings and regulations on who gets our tax money. For profit education, made some rich while taking advantage of veterans, and seniors too.
